categories: Category:Creatures of the Outer Rim Territories

nodes.text: The Nimgorrhean saber-wasp, also known as just a saber-wasp, was a flying insect from the Nimgorrhea system.
Null-class Advanced Recon Commando Ordo Skirata likened freighter pilot Nyreen Vollen's usual grim expression to someone who looked like they continuously chew saber-wasps.
